JDRF Design System

  • Documentation will trigger a new window or tab.
  • Github will trigger a new window or tab.

Content

Over a dozen reusable components built to provide buttons, dropdowns, input groups, navigation, alerts, and much more.

  • Overview Download FAQ
  • Components
    • Buttons
    • Forms
    • Side Navigation
  • Content
    • Colors
    • Elevation
    • Icons
    • Typography

Elevation

Elevations are applied using the elevation- class and are numbered one to five. elevation-one would be the lowest elevation versus elevation-five is the highest.

Elevation 1

Elevation 2

Elevation 3

Elevation 4

Elevation 5

		<div class="f-rectangle elevation-one"></div>
		<div class="f-rectangle elevation-two"></div>
		<div class="f-rectangle elevation-three"></div>
		<div class="f-rectangle elevation-four"></div>
		<div class="f-rectangle elevation-five"></div>
	
<div class="f-example-inline">
	<div class="f-rectangle elevation-one"></div>

	<p class="f-example-desc">Elevation 1</p>
</div>
<div class="f-example-inline">
	<div class="f-rectangle elevation-two"></div>

	<p class="f-example-desc">Elevation 2</p>
</div>
<div class="f-example-inline">
	<div class="f-rectangle elevation-three"></div>

	<p class="f-example-desc">Elevation 3</p>
</div>
<div class="f-example-inline">
	<div class="f-rectangle elevation-four"></div>

	<p class="f-example-desc">Elevation 4</p>
</div>
<div class="f-example-inline">
	<div class="f-rectangle elevation-five"></div>

	<p class="f-example-desc">Elevation 5</p>
</div>

<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;div class="f-rectangle elevation-one"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
		&lt;div class="f-rectangle elevation-two"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
		&lt;div class="f-rectangle elevation-three"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
		&lt;div class="f-rectangle elevation-four"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
		&lt;div class="f-rectangle elevation-five"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</code>
	</pre>

Icons

We're using Material Icons for icons across the Design System.

It is recommended to make use of the sr-only class to include screen-reader text that is visually hidden, but can help identify icons to screen reader users.

Material Icons have a ligatures feature that allows icons to show by typing within the element. Due to this feature, depending on whether the button is icon only or icon with text, the structure of the HTML will have to change slightly.

Icon Only Buttons

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-primary">
			<span class="sr-only">Primary button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-secondary">
			<span class="sr-only">Secondary button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-outline">
			<span class="sr-only">Outlined button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>

Left Icon with Text

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary">
		<span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"></span>
		<span>Icon Left</span>
	</button>

Right Icon with Text

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary">
			<span>Icon Right</span>
			<span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	</button>
	
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Icon Only Buttons</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood mi-48 btn btn-primary">
			<span class="sr-only">Primary button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood mi-48 btn btn-secondary">
			<span class="sr-only">Secondary button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>

		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-outline">
			<span class="sr-only">Outlined button with mood icon.</span>
		</button>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-primary"&gt;
			&lt;span class="sr-only">Primary button with mood icon.&lt;/span&gt;
		&lt;/button&gt;

		&lt;button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-secondary"&gt;
			&lt;span class="sr-only">Secondary button with mood icon.&lt;/span&gt;
		&lt;/button&gt;

		&lt;button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="material-icons mi-mood btn btn-outline"&gt;
			&lt;span class="sr-only">Outlined button with mood icon.&lt;/span&gt;
		&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Left Icon with Text</h4>

	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary">
			<span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"></span>
			<span>Icon Left</span>
		</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;
		&lt;span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
		&lt;span&gt;Icon Left&lt;/span&gt;
	&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Right Icon with Text</h4>

	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary">
			<span>Icon Right</span>
			<span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"></span>
		</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" name="mood-button-example" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;
			&lt;span&gt;Icon Right&lt;/span&gt;
			&lt;span class="material-icons mi-mood" aria-hidden="true"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
	&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

Typography

These are notes associated with Typography

Headings

Heading One

Heading Two

Heading Three

Heading Four

Heading Five
Heading Six
		<h1>Heading One</h1>
		<h2>Heading Two</h2>
		<h3>Heading Three</h3>
		<h4>Heading Four</h4>
		<h5>Heading Five</h5>
		<h6>Heading Six</h6>

Display

Display 1

Display 2

Display 3

Display 4

		<h1 class="display-1">Display 1</h1>
		<h1 class="display-2">Display 2</h1>
		<h1 class="display-3">Display 3</h1>
		<h1 class="display-4">Display 4</h1>

Lead

Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus dolor auctor. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus. 

		<p class="lead">
		  Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus dolor auctor. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus.
		</p>

Paragraph

JDRF’s mission is to accelerate life-changing breakthroughs to cure, prevent and treat T1D and its complications

		<p>JDRF’s mission is to accelerate life-changing breakthroughs to cure, prevent and treat T1D and its complications</p>

Inline Text Elements

You can use the mark tag to highlight text.

This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text.

This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.

This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.

This line of text will render as underlined

This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.

This line rendered as bold text.

This line rendered as italicized text.

		<p>You can use the mark tag to <mark>highlight text.</p>
		<p><del>This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text.</del></p>
		<p><s>This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.</s></p>
		<p><ins>This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.</ins></p>
		<p><u>This line of text will render as underlined</u></p>
		<p><small>This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</p>
		<p><strong>This line rendered as bold text.</strong></p>
		<p><em>This line rendered as italicized text.</em></p>

Blockquotes

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.

		<blockquote class="blockquote">
		  <p class="m-b-0">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.</p>
		</blockquote>

Anchor Links

Jump down to our JDRF section for details!
Here are the details to JDRF. 
		Jump down to our <a href="#jdrf-section">JDRF section</a> for details!
		<div id="jdrf-section">
			Here are the details to JDRF.
		</div>
	
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Headings</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<h1>Heading One</h1>
		<h2>Heading Two</h2>
		<h3>Heading Three</h3>
		<h4>Heading Four</h4>
		<h5>Heading Five</h5>
		<h6>Heading Six</h6>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;h1&gt;Heading One&lt;/h1&gt;
		&lt;h2&gt;Heading Two&lt;/h2&gt;
		&lt;h3&gt;Heading Three&lt;/h3&gt;
		&lt;h4&gt;Heading Four&lt;/h4&gt;
		&lt;h5&gt;Heading Five&lt;/h5&gt;
		&lt;h6&gt;Heading Six&lt;/h6&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Display</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<h1 class="display-1">Display 1</h1>
		<h1 class="display-2">Display 2</h1>
		<h1 class="display-3">Display 3</h1>
		<h1 class="display-4">Display 4</h1>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;h1 class="display-1"&gt;Display 1&lt;/h1&gt;
		&lt;h1 class="display-2"&gt;Display 2&lt;/h1&gt;
		&lt;h1 class="display-3"&gt;Display 3&lt;/h1&gt;
		&lt;h1 class="display-4"&gt;Display 4&lt;/h1&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Lead</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<p class="lead">
			Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus dolor auctor. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus.
		</p>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;p class="lead"&gt;
		  Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus dolor auctor. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus.
		&lt;/p&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Paragraph</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<p>JDRF’s mission is to accelerate life-changing breakthroughs to cure, prevent and treat T1D and its complications</p>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;p&gt;JDRF’s mission is to accelerate life-changing breakthroughs to cure, prevent and treat T1D and its complications&lt;/p&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Inline Text Elements</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<p>You can use the mark tag to <mark>highlight</mark> text.</p>
		<p><del>This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text.</del></p>
		<p><s>This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.</s></p>
		<p><ins>This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.</ins></p>
		<p><u>This line of text will render as underlined</u></p>
		<p><small>This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</small></p>
		<p><strong>This line rendered as bold text.</strong></p>
		<p><em>This line rendered as italicized text.</em></p>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;p&gt;You can use the mark tag to &lt;mark&gt;highlight</mark> text.&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;del&gt;This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text.&lt;/del&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;s&gt;This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.&lt;/s&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;ins&gt;This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.&lt;/ins&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;u&gt;This line of text will render as underlined&lt;/u&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;small&gt;This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</small>&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;This line rendered as bold text.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;This line rendered as italicized text.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Blockquotes</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<blockquote class="blockquote">
			<p class="m-b-0">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.</p>
		</blockquote>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;blockquote class="blockquote"&gt;
		  &lt;p class="m-b-0"&gt;Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.&lt;/p&gt;
